Spr-Aachen/Easy-Voice-Toolkit

AI toolkit for speech recognition, transcription, and voice conversion

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • open source speech recognition toolkit with ASR, VAD, speaker verification, and model zoo
  • open-weight text-to-speech model for fast, natural voice synthesis
  • extracts voice features for speaker recognition and fake speech detection
  • YouTube downloader, speech separation, transcription, translation, TTS, and voice cloning toolkit for creators
  • AI toolkit for speech enhancement, separation, super-resolution, and speaker extraction
  • Offline voice recognition for Linux
  • open source audio model for expressive speech and voice cloning
  • open-source platform for building AI voice and chat agents
  • Open-source AI voice interaction system from hardware to software
  • Text-to-speech engine for long-form audio
